author: Shilpa Chawda
text:
All hearts are made up of flesh and blood,then why do we have pains and excitements?
These are emotions but where do they come from?
How are they related to heart?
This locked out has given me time to think such questions..please help.

#RandomThoughts 
#YehRishteyHainPyaarKe

text:
Happy women's Day to all the women who still have  in them
 A little girl who craves for ice-cream
A teenager who worries about pimples
A lady who loves clothes n shopping
A woman who wants to look young and have  perfect balance of wit n wisdom
N the one who believes 50 is new30

text:

This week all episodes are like a coaster ride.!!

author: Shilpa Chawda
text:
After watching today's episode again, I have a confusion..

Meenu prayed to Radhakrishna.. Hey Maa Ambe..!!🤔

No wonder her prayers are not heard.!!😋😂

Earlier Baba prayed to Ganpati Bappa in front of Radhakrishna. his prayers weren't heard..!!
#YehRishteyHainPyaarKe

author: Shilpa Chawda
text:
I'm so done with Nannu drama..and I'm sure many people will agree with me also but there's a thorny question in my mind which keeps pricking me..!!
